newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Goldman suggests paper overweight.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Goldman suggests paper overweight.

text.p: -- Goldman Sachs analyst Mark Weintraub confirmed he started coverage of the paper and forest products sector as overweight.

-- Willamette Industries Inc and Georgia-Pacific Corp were put on Goldman's recommended list, while Boise Cascade Corp was started as trading buy, the analyst confirmed. He declined to immediately provide further details.
-- A Goldman source said the analyst also started coverage of the following as market outperform: Champion International Corp, Union Camp and Weyerhaeuser Co.
-- The source said Goldman started the following as market perform: Bowater Inc, International Paper Co, Rayonier Inc and Stone Container Corp.
-- The source said Longview Fibre Co and Temple-Inland Inc were also started as market perform.
